text: Igor Solopov (17 April 1961 â€“ 12 June 2019) was an Estonian table tennis player. He was born in Magnitogorsk, Russian SFSR. He competed for Estonia in the men's singles event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. Solopov competed at seven World Table Tennis Championships. He also won a bronze medal with the Soviet men's team at the 1978 European Table Tennis Championships. Solopov's death on 12 June 2019 was announced by the Table Tennis Federation of Russia. He was 58. ==References== ==Other websites== *Igor Solopov at the International Olympic Committee Category:1961 births Category:2019 deaths Category:1992 Summer Olympics Category:Olympians for Estonia Category:Olympians for the Soviet Union Category:Table tennis players
title: Igor Solopov
